channel.title: Rodney Weston
channel.description: Recent news about Rodney Weston, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Daily Business Buzz
item.description:
New ferry!
West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on June 24 to announce a new vessel for the Digby-Saint John ferry service. Published on ...

item.title: Mentioned by Nova Scotia
item.description:
NS: Big news revealed for Digby-Saint John ferry - Daily Business Buzz
NS: Big news revealed for Digby-Saint John ferry. West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on Monday for the announcement.

item.title: Mentioned by Digby Courier
item.description:
New ferry for Digby-Saint John service
West Nova MP Greg Kerr, Saint John MP Rodney Weston, Central Nova MP and Minister of Defence Peter MacKay and South Shore MP Gerald Keddy were in Digby on Monday, June 23 to announce a few vessel for the Digby-Saint John ferry service.

item.title: Mentioned by MarineLink
item.description:
Veteran Nova Scotia Ferry to be Replaced
The Honourable Peter MacKay, Minister of National Defence and Member of Parliament for Central Nova; Greg Kerr, Member of Parliament for West Nova; and Rodney Weston, Member of Parliament for Saint John, have announced that the Government of Canada will invest in a replacement vessel for the federally-owned MV Princess of Acadia. ... “Our government understands the importance of this ferry service to the local community and economy in support of regional trade and tourism,” said MP Weston.

item.title: Mentioned by TheChronicleHerald.ca
item.description:
Digby to get new ferry
West Nova MP Greg Kerr and Saint John MP Rodney Weston tag teamed the announcement at the podium Monday to a jubilant crowd peppered with federal, provincial and municipal politicians from both provinces. “It's time for the great old lady to retire,” ...
